params.gameId: The ID of the game to join
The ID of the game to play in
params.row: The row to remove stones from (0-based index)
params.stones: The number of stones to remove

params.gameId: The ID of the game to view

games(uint256).notice: Arrays are mappings with length storage length = 2 0 => Session({0, 1, 0}) 1 => Session({10, 20, 100})

joinGame(uint256).notice: Join an existing game as the second player

playTurn(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Play a turn in the game by removing stones from a row

totalGames().notice: Get the total number of games created.

viewGame(uint256).notice: View the current state of a game
